Module com.example.demo

Package com.example.demo.gameElements

package com.example.demo.gameElements
package that holds all the relevant elements used in the game scene including the game scene itself. The cell class is also defined here due to its core role within the game as an indicator.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.example.demo
    main package that contains all the classes
    com.example.demo.gameElements.Utilities
    package contains classes that are used within the game that are for checking the states of the game.
    com.example.demo.Controllers
    package for all the controllers used in the Game.
    com.example.demo.endGameElements
    package that houses the elements that are used in the end game screen, also is the package that has the class to determine if a new highscore has been set.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Cell
    This class is used in instantiating the tiles we see on the game scene with the dimension that the user has chosen (that being nxn dimensions).
    GameScene
    This class is the main class for all operations that shall be orchestrated within the game scene (i.e.
    gameVisuals
    This class' main functionality is to display the visual elements within the game scene, those being mainly the score board coupled with the score text and the background rectangle for the playing field to enhance visibility.
    TextMaker
    This class' main responsibility revolves around the texts (numbers) within the cells on the playing field.
